scenario_text.value: Hey, Takuma. You think I’ve grown at all?
Wow, Minoru, that came outta nowhere.
How should I respond to Minoru?
You’ve grown a lot!
Not one bit.

I think you’ve grown a lot! Not that your
mouth has improved. Or your attitude, really.
Wait, what?! Then what’s left?!

How can I put this... When the chips are
down, you say the right things these days.

The heck? Who’s gonna say the wrong thing
when things get tough?!
I mean, I guess that’s true...

You usually say such silly things, it’s no
wonder they lack faith in you.
Jeez, lay off the harsh browns, Falcomon...
I wouldn’t say so.
Seriously?! Guess I haven’t really changed...

Still, having the same old Minoru around
really keeps me on the level.

I appreciate the sentiment... But man,
I thought I’d at least grown a little bit.
A shame indeed, Minoru...

Still, when I came back here with Miyuki and
met up with you again...
I thought you’d become pretty reliable.

Well yeah, when you went back to our world,
you were gone a whole month and a half.

Still, when we talk like this, it feels just
like old times.

Say, Takuma, don’t you think I’ve gotten
a bit taller?
Has Minoru gotten taller?
I don’t think so.
A little bit, I guess?
Hmm, not really.
Aw come on, look closer! Like, reeeal close!
I must say I don’t see it either, Minoru.

No, I’m telling you! There’s, like, at least
an extra inch on me!
Well, maybe an inch, I guess?

See?! I’ve grown a whole inch since we got to
this world.
Indeed, I suppose that counts for something.
Right?! You can see it too, right, Falcomon?!

Boy, at this rate I’ll be the tallest one in
our crew before long!

I’m not strong like you or Kaito, am I?
I’m more of a cheerleader than anything else.
What do you mean?

I mean, I’m pretty useless in a fight, and
I couldn’t help save Miyuki at all.

Still... If I can grow even a little bit,
I think I could be of more help to everyone.
Minoru...
You feel the same way, don’t ya, Takuma?
How should I respond to Minoru?
Yeah, I do.
No, I don’t.
Yeah, I feel the same way.

Right? Better eat my protein so I grow up big
and strong!

Minoru, your growth should be more than just
physical...

Don’t sweat the small stuff, Falcomon!
I’ve gotta start from somewhere!

Goodness... Well, that’s Minoru’s way of
thinking for you.

All right, Takuma! Now that that’s settled,
let’s pack on the pounds!
I don’t think that’s how it works...

Say what? You don’t think a little growth on
my part will help everyone out?

That’s not what I... All I’m trying to say is
you’ve always helped us out, in your way.
Reeeally? I wonder...

Yeah, so don’t get ahead of yourself.
We’ve all got some room to grow.
Friends are people who grow together.

Ohhh, I get it... Sometimes you say some
pretty mature things for your age, Takuma.
Huh, you think so?

Yeah, you’re the only one that doesn’t
realize it.

Whoops! If I got time to talk, better fill
my pie hole!
I want to grow as big and tall as I can here!
